location.physicalLocation: British Library: India Office Records and Private Papers

titleInfo.title: Letter from James Charles Edwards, Bushire to Lewis Pelly

mods.abstract: Letter regarding tending to Pelly's plants and arranging for cuttings to be given to various people in Bushire; matters of protecol and the use of escorts when leaving the Residency; explaining the situation with the Berenicefollowing the resignation of Captain Low, allegations made by Mr Malcolm against the steamers engineers, problems with its engines in February which had required all the engineers to remain onboard and Mr Dawes forthcoming testimony in support of the engineers.
